Package gust.backend.model

Interface CacheOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OperationOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FetchOptions
    public interface CacheOptions
extends OperationOptions
    Specifies operational options related to caching. These options are usable orthogonally to the main OperationOptions tree. See below for a description of each configurable property.

    Cache configuration (defaults in parens):

    • enableCache() (true): Whether to allow caching at all.
    • cacheTimeout() (1): Amount of time to give the cache before falling back to storage.
    • cacheTimeoutUnit() (SECONDS): Time unit to correspond with cacheTimeoutValue.
    • cacheDefaultTTL(): Default amount of time to let things stick around in the cache.
    • cacheDefaultTTLUnit(): Time unit to correspond with cacheDefaultTTL.
    • cacheEvictionMode(): Eviction mode to operate in.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  CacheOptions.EvictionMode
      Describes operating modes with regard to cache eviction.

      • Methods inherited from interface gust.backend.model.OperationOptions

        executorService, timeoutUnit, timeoutValue

    • Method Detail

      • enableCache

        @Nonnull
default java.lang.Boolean enableCache()
        Returns:
        Whether the cache should be enabled, if installed. Defaults to `true`.

      • cacheTimeout

        @Nonnull
default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> cacheTimeout()
        Returns:
        Value to apply to the cache timeout. If left unspecified, the global default is used.

      • cacheTimeoutUnit

        @Nonnull
default java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit cacheTimeoutUnit()
        Returns:
        Unit to apply to the cache timeout. If left unspecified, the global default is used.

      • cacheDefaultTTL

        @Nonnull
default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> cacheDefaultTTL()
        Returns:
        Default amount of time to let things remain in the cache.

      • cacheDefaultTTLUnit

        @Nonnull
default java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit cacheDefaultTTLUnit()
        Returns:
        Unit to apply to the default cache lifetime (TTL) value.

      • cacheEvictionMode

        @Nonnull
default java.util.Optional<CacheOptions.EvictionMode> cacheEvictionMode()
        Returns:
        Specifier describing the cache eviction mode to apply, if any.
